title: Urban 1Bed/1Bath - 1st Month Free!
map_address: 118 Broadway Ave E near Broadway E & E John
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 512 Sq.
Make your mark in the epicenter of culture, diversity and self-expression in one of Seattle’s trendiest neighborhoods.
Connection on Broadway offers a lifestyle that blurs the line between vibrant city life and a inclusive neighborhood.
Immerse yourself in an energetic location in the center of Capitol Hill, with a public farmers market on-site and Cal Anderson Park in your own backyard.
At home, take advantage of attractive amenities thoughtfully curated to enhance your daily routine, from a fitness center and yoga studio to a rooftop terrace.

Quartz Countertop, Gas Cooktop*, Views of Cal Anderson Park*, Balcony/Patio*, Electric Cooktop, Roller Shades, Multiple Cabinet Finishes, Engineered Hardwood Flooring, Build In Kitchen Island*, Energy Star Rated Appliance Package, Air Conditioning

Easy Access to Local Parks, Pet Spa, Pet Friendly, Weekly On Site Farmers Market, Garage Parking, On Site Boba Tea Shop: Coming Soon, On Site Brunch/Lunch Restaurant: Coming Soon!, Bike Storage, Remote Work Spaces, Fitness Center and Yoga Studio, Controlled Access Entry, Additional Storage Available, Pet Park, On Site Café: Coming Soon, On Site Community Plaza, Rooftop Grills and Fire Pits, H-Mart: Coming Soon!, On Site Management & Maintenance, Easy Access to Link Light Rail, 10 Unique Community Spaces
Pet policy: We allow two(2) pets per unit with no weight limit following Greystar breed restrictions.
Please call our Leasing Office for complete Pet Policy information.
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
